thread.title: ISIS video shows child jihadi tell of how he was groomed
thread.title_full: ISIS video shows child jihadi tell of how he was groomed

title: ISIS video shows child jihadi tell of how he was groomed
text: 'We won't sleep until we see the flag of our prophet in all of Allah's lands': Horrific ISIS video shows child jihadi tell the story of how he was groomed - before he shoots a man in the head WARNING GRAPHIC IMAGES The video, titled The Story of Saladin, shows a young boy saying his father told him he would take him to a military camp if he 'studied hard' It then shows the young boy cornering a man and shooting him in the head The video, was obtained by the Clarion Project, opens with a black screen and the line: 'ISIS gives birth to another child terrorist' Several videos released by ISIS show children as young as toddlers holding guns and promoting the extremist organisation
